column6: A REALM OF KINGS story! Torn between duty and friendship, the galaxy's #1 lawman hunts for the most wanted man in the universe: Darkhawk! Determined to bring him to justice, Nova will rocket into the universe's most dangerous new location: The Fault!
column8: | writer:Dan Abnett | writer:Andy Lanning | colorist:Impacto - Bruno Hang | penciller:Brandon Peterson | letterer:Cory Petit | inker:Andrea Di Vito
